pkgmetadata.longdescription:
AMD Radeon ProRender for Blender is a rendering plugin for Blender.
The plugin product highlights can be found at: https://www.amd.com/en/technologies/radeon-prorender-blender
Rendering may require Vulkan for Full Spectrum Rendering (FSR). You need a Vulkan compatible device and Vulkan driver but will fall back to OpenCL if it doesn't meet requirements. For details see:
https://radeon-pro.github.io/RadeonProRenderDocs/plugins/blender/full_spectrum_rendering.html
See also
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:AMD_GPU_features
